import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import "./CourseStyles.css"; export default function Career() { const navigate = useNavigate(); return (
{/* Header */}

🎓 Career Guidance

Build your future with personal mentorship, resume building, interview preparation, and career strategies for students & professionals. Our experts will help you unlock your full potential and land your dream job.

₹30,000 ₹14,999 🔥 50% OFF
{/* Course Overview */}

📘 Course Overview

  • 🕒 Duration: 3 Months
  • 📚 Level: All Levels (Students & Professionals)
  • 🌐 Language: English
  • 🎓 Certification: Yes
  • 👨‍🏫 Mentorship: One-on-One Guidance
{/* What You Will Learn */}

🚀 What You Will Learn

  • Personalized Career Roadmap & Skill Gap Analysis
  • Resume Building, Portfolio Creation & LinkedIn Optimization
  • Mock Interviews with Feedback
  • Soft Skills, Communication & Confidence Training
  • Job Search Strategies & Networking Tips
{/* Extra Benefits */}

🎁 Extra Benefits

  • Exclusive Career Counseling Sessions
  • Access to Job Boards & Industry Connections
  • Recorded Sessions for Lifetime Access
  • Group Webinars & Networking Events
{/* Enroll Button */}
); }
